warning: non-canonical string literal in `syntax` declaration
  --> testdata/parser/syntax/proto2_escaped.proto:15:10
   | 
15 | syntax = "proto\x32";
   |          ^^^^^^^^^^^ 
  help: replace it with a canonical string
   | 
15 | - syntax = "proto\x32";
15 | + syntax = "proto2";
   | 

 encountered  1 warning
